message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"thing; object","sentence":"桌子上有东西。","image_prompt":"A classroom table with an object (blurred or generic shape) placed on top, surrounded by simple HSK1-level school items, in a soft apocalypse animation style.
